Lyric:
[00:27.399]The last that ever she saw him,

[00:35.218]He passed on worried and warning,
[00:38.907]carried away by a moonlight shadow,
[00:41.987]Lost in a riddle that Saturday night,
[00:45.288]far away on the other side,
[00:46.968]he was caught in the middle of a desperate fight,
[00:51.889]and she couldn't find how to push through.
[00:56.176]The trees that whisper in the evening,

[01:15.188]far away on the other side,
[01:18.567]He was shot six times by a man on the run,
[01:22.188]and she couldn't find how to push through.
[01:29.188]I stay, I pray, I see you in heaven far away,
[01:37.188]I stay, I pray, I see you in heaven one day.
